revised_title: Micro-crystalline Structure of Platinum: A Comprehensive Study
tldr: This study investigates the micro-crystalline structure of platinum using various etching techniques and microscopy. The author discovers a beautiful crystalline structure with primary and secondary crystals, and observes similarities between the structure of platinum and gold. The study also highlights the allotriomorphic nature of the micro-crystalline structure and its resemblance to the crystalline structure of gold and silver.
